name: SlickBeatz
body:
# E-Commerce Application

I built a full stack e-commerce application utilizing JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, ASP.NET MVC (bootstrap), Angular JS, Entity Framework, T-SQL, and C#. My website was made to sell sound devices such as earphones, headphones, and speakers. I stored data into my database, which I then called into my application through an API.Check out some of the screenshots from my website below!

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/gshah921/gshah921.github.io/master/1-homepage.PNG)
